channel.title: Changing The Text Of items easy or hard?
channel.description:
well i dont want to leach so i'm going to be adding pest control, and ill be creating and re-texting some items can someone help me with retexting like this e.g.
what file to use: where to add: and stuff like that thanks if u helped

item.title: Changing The Text Of items easy or hard?
item.dc:creator: @Joshinator Joshinator
item.description:
@Joshinator wrote:

well i dont want to rename the item. maybe i wud but for now i need help retexting the items and HOW TO DO IT[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2008, 03:59:13 PM[/size][hr]i searched class8.java nothing i have compiled.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing The Text Of items easy or hard?

item.title: Changing The Text Of items easy or hard?
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

When you add an item its usually gonna be in the class8.java file… with non renamed clients
otherwise itemdef for renamed clients.
Yeah but no its as easy as writing the items name

if(i == ****){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0;
class8.anInt174 = 7354;//item look
class8.anInt181 = 1957;
class8.anInt190 = 498;
class8.anInt198 = 484;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = -1;
class8.anInt194 = -1;
class8.anInt165 = 7355;
class8.anInt200 = 7244;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = "Bandos godsword ";// See here this is where you change the name of the item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A great weapon, used by the best warriors.”.getBytes();

    }
